text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Oh please, the cover-up has begun. Trump’s daily press briefings were a disaster. He wants to disband the Task Force to stop public briefings, change the narrative and literally spread more lies and disinformation about the COVID-19 pandemic and public health crisis.
